channel.title: Call of Duty 5 Beta public release (2am PST, 11/4)
channel.description:
My friend got an email from gamestop after complaining about the beta codes not working, so he got a message. Treyarch has decided to give everyone a taste of the game exactly one week before its release on election day :)
The beta will be available in the marketplace for download for XBox 360 users.
Just a heads up to people who didn't get codes.

@Rog3r wrote:

I downloaded it today and playing it.

My username: Mazeingmaze
Level 12 at the moment (waa)

item.title: Call of Duty 5 Beta public release (2am PST, 11/4)
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I found the weapons and the overall attention to detail much better, multiplayer feels more like a war. On CoD4 most of the weapons felt weightless and plastic, these actually feel like real guns.

So yeah, i didn’t think i would bother with this game at all but i’ve gone and pre ordered it on PS3.

Read full topic
